Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle, rising to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '30' or '80'. Name Diokleia. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, BIBALEX 0017.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (132)
